title: Jess Travel Blog
content: Where I collect all my adventures and stories from my year abroad in Europe.

title: Jessica Kalip Portfolio
content: This website you're on, which is my personal portfolio

title: Plan It For Me
content: Users can create weekend trip itineraries based on their preferred city, trip duration, andinterests. Activities, selected by APIs, are compared to each other by distance and grouped byday for an efficient itinerary.

title: Loan Me
content: A marketplace for users to requests hangouts with people filtered by location and preferencessuch as age, gender, and interests.

title: JavaScript30
content: A 30-day vanilla JavaScript coding challenge where we built tools such as native speech recognition, creating our own version of the Paint app and photobooth on the browser, and using local storage and event delegation.
